hedline.hl1: IBM Global Services And Texaco in an Alliance

abstract.p: Texaco awards 5-year, $100 million primary global information technology service contract to IBM Global Services (S)

block.p: White Plains-based Texaco has awarded a five-year, $100 million contract to IBM Global Services to be the company's primary global information technology service provider. IBM, which is based in Armonk, will manage Texaco's 9,000 North American desktop computers and the company's Local Area Networks. Additionally, IBM will provide remote support for 550 servers at more than 30 locations around the world.
